taM tE# duqScakShAq mA&va# Kyaqnmayiq vasu#H purOqvasu#rvAqkpA vAca#M mE pAhiq mayiq vasu#rviqdadva#suScakShuqShpAScakShu#r mE pAhiq mayiq vasu#H saqM~Myadva#suH SrOtraqpAH SrOtra#M mE pAhiq BUra#siq SrEShThO# raSmIqnAM prA#NaqpAH prAqNaM mE# pAhiq dhUra#siq SrEShThO# raSmIqnAma#pAnaqpA a#pAqnaM mE# pAhiq yO na# indravAyU mitrAvaruNA-vaSvinAvaBiqdAsa#tiq BrAtRu#vya ( ) uqtpipI#tE SuBaspatI iqdamaqhaM tamadha#raM pAdayAmiq yathE$ndrAq&hamu#ttaqmaScEqtayA#ni || 43
(raqkShaqsvaq - BrrAtRu#vyaq - strayO#daSa ca) (A10)
